channel.title: AidStream for publishing IATI data: Guidance and training
channel.description:
If you are working with publishers who are using AidStream, please point them in the direction of https://www.bond.org.uk/effectiveness/aidstream. They will find a step by step guide* to using and publishing IATI data with AidStream, based on Bond's extensive experience of working with organisations on IATI. It's in English and we'd love to get it translated into French, Spanish and Flemish or German if anyone is able to help!
We also run one day workshops for CSOs on IATI. The workshop includes AidStream training and information about DFID and Dutch MFA guidelines: https://www.bond.org.uk/learning/introduction-to-iati-publishing-for-uk-ngos - this workshop is open to both UK and European CSOs.
*Please note that this information, as with all our IATI guidance, has an open license CC 4 BY-NC-SA https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/ - Bond invests in and shares our IATI information and guides as a public good.
